Physics begins in wonder

Welcome!

I am Qingru Hu 胡清茹. I am currently a first-year graduate student at the Department of Astronomy, Tsinghua University. I was an undergraduate of Tsinghua Unversity. I am interested in theoretical astrophysics, especially planetary dynamics these days.

This website is under construction. I will update it soon.
